pvpZvz.title: PVP ZVZ BUILD
pvpZvz.subtitle: Large Scale - Mass Combat
pvpZvz.context: This build is optimized for large-scale combat (Zerg vs Zerg), where dozens or hundreds of players face each other simultaneously. The focus is on survival, area control, and sustained group damage.
pvpZvz.strategy: Stay in formation with your group, prioritize targets called by shotcallers, and use your area control abilities at the right time. Coordination is key to winning ZVZ battles.
pvpZvz.guideNote: Link will be configured soon by administrator

pvpSmall.title: SMALL SCALE PVP BUILD
pvpSmall.subtitle: Small Scale - Tactical Combat
pvpSmall.context: Designed for combat with 5-15 players, where mobility, burst damage, and individual decisions make the difference. Ideal for ganks, resource defense, and quick skirmishes.
pvpSmall.strategy: Maximize your damage potential in short windows, use terrain to your advantage, and always be ready to chase or retreat. Quick communication with your small group is essential.
pvpSmall.guideNote: Link will be configured soon by administrator

pve.title: PVE BUILD
pve.subtitle: Exploration and Dungeons
pve.context: Optimized for dungeon exploration, resource farming, and facing PvE bosses. Balances sustained damage, survivability, and resource gathering efficiency.
pve.strategy: Focus on efficient ability rotations to maximize sustained DPS. Learn boss patterns and keep your potions and consumables always ready.
pve.guideNote: Link will be configured soon by administrator

discordModal.title: Welcome to Smoking Snakes LATAM
discordModal.subtitle: Read the rules and information before joining Discord
rules: Respect among all members is mandatory
Active communication on Discord is essential
Trolling or sabotage of members is prohibited
discordModal.profileDescription: Smoking Snakes LATAM is a guild focused on cooperation, strategy and territorial dominance. We work together to build the strongest empire in Pax Dei, with military organization and discipline.
discordModal.agreement: I have read and agree to the rules

about.title: About the Clan
about.description: Smoking Snakes LATAM is a guild formed by players from Latin America. Our focus is cooperation, progress, and territorial dominance in the Pax Dei universe.

game.title: About the Game
game.description: Pax Dei is a medieval sandbox MMORPG where cooperation and strategy define success. On the Selene – Keris server (Aven Region), Smoking Snakes LATAM stands out for organization and collective strength, building a united empire.

phase1.title: Phase 1 — Castle Preparation
phase1.description: Focus on building the central structure, gathering resources and defining strategic areas.
phase1.fullDescription: In this initial phase, our goal is to establish the foundations of our empire. All members should focus on gathering basic resources such as wood, stone and iron. The central castle structure needs to be erected with maximum priority. Each profession should begin organizing their work areas and establish efficient collection routes. This is a crucial phase that will determine our growth speed in the coming weeks.

phase2.title: Phase 2 — Consolidation of Profession Houses
phase2.description: Establishment of specialized workshops and training of master craftsmen.
phase2.fullDescription: With the castle established, we now focus on creating specialized infrastructure. Each Profession House must have its workshop fully functional with all necessary tools. Master craftsmen should train apprentices and establish efficient production lines. The goal is to achieve self-sufficiency in all crafting areas, allowing us to produce high-quality equipment for the entire guild.

phase3.title: Phase 3 — Territory Takeover
phase3.description: Territorial expansion, strategic alliances and regional dominance.
phase3.fullDescription: The time has come to expand our influence. With our defenses consolidated and production established, we will begin conquering strategic territories. This includes outposts, trade routes and areas rich in rare resources. We will seek alliances with allied guilds and demonstrate our strength against adversaries. Every member must be prepared to defend our interests and participate in organized military campaigns.

professions.title: Profession Houses
professions.blacksmithDescription: Specialist in forging essential tools. Responsible for producing pickaxes, axes, shovels and other basic tools that keep the guild operational.
professions.weaponsmithDescription: Master in the art of creating deadly weapons. Produces swords, war axes, spears and other weapons that equip our warriors in battles.
professions.armorsmithDescription: Craftsman specialized in protection. Forges heavy armors, shields and defensive pieces that keep our combatants alive on the battlefield.
professions.leatherworkerDescription: Skilled leather worker. Creates light armor, bags, belts and flexible equipment ideal for scouts and archers.
professions.builderDescription: Essential builder for our infrastructure. Responsible for erecting structures, fortifications and furniture that compose our empire.
professions.alchemistDescription: Master of elements and potions. Produces healing elixirs, strength potions and other alchemical preparations that provide combat advantages.
professions.farmerDescription: Guardian of guild sustenance. Cultivates food, raises animals and prepares meals that keep everyone nourished and strong.
professions.jewelryDescription: Artist of gems and precious metals. Creates rings, necklaces and amulets with magical properties that strengthen guild members.
professions.recruiterDescription: Responsible for expansion and training. Recruits new members, organizes training and ensures everyone is prepared for their roles.

mission1.title: Iron Collection
mission1.fullDescription: This mission is critical for strengthening our defenses. We need large amounts of iron to reinforce castle walls and produce equipment for the entire guild. All miners should prioritize collecting this resource. In addition to iron, we also need additional wood for structural supports.

mission2.title: Outpost Defense
mission2.description: Protect the northern outpost against invaders
mission2.fullDescription: Our northern outpost is under constant threat from hostile factions. This mission requires eliminating all enemy forces in the area and establishing regular patrols. Success in this mission will ensure safe trade routes and access to valuable resources in the northern region.

mission3.title: Dark Forest Exploration
mission3.description: Map rare resources in the western region
mission3.fullDescription: The Dark Forest is known to harbor very rare resources and magical materials. This exploration mission aims to completely map the region, identify points of interest and catalog unique resources. Experienced scouts are needed, as the area presents unknown dangers. The knowledge gained will be invaluable for future operations.

mission4.title: Watchtower Construction
mission4.description: Complete strategic tower at southern border
mission4.fullDescription: The southern Watchtower will be our most important strategic observation point. It will allow us to monitor enemy movements, control trade routes and serve as an advanced defense post. Construction is in final stages, requiring only final materials and finishing. This structure will be crucial for our territorial security.
